== Moothakunnam (CT) (627985) ==

Moothakunnam (CT) is a town in the [[Paravur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 9.93 sq. km. and harbouring 6963 households with total population of 27458 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 29 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 243 km. Male population is 13279 and female population is 14179. Scheduled Caste population is 1224 and Scheduled Tribes population is 103. Census Location Code of the town is 627985<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 29 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 29 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 24 km.
